page.title: 07AGRICULTURE FARMING
page.content: Here are the names of all the farms in our area,{ {Berthlas,Braichodnant,Bryncoch,Caetwpa {,Coedcae,Cringoed,Cwmcarnedd-Uchaf,Cwm {carnedd Isaf,Diosg,Dolgadfan,Gelli, {Maesgwion,Penybont,PlasEsgair,TyCanol, {TyGwyn,TyMawr,TyPella,Wynnstay Farm. There are many things the farmer does throughout the year.The farms are sheep rearing farms with some cattle. Shearing and hay cutting are important activities on the farms.Most of the farms now collect silage with harvesters drawn by tractors and high sided trailers.Bales of dried hay can be round or rectangular in shape.The transporters of the farmers are usually lorries but many have landrovers and trailers as well.Some farms also keep afew hens.Grants from the government have helped the farmers to build large buildings and hillroads
